sentence: Mandela Barnes and State Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, along with Alex Lasry, an executive with the Milwaukee Bucks, and Tom Nelson, a county executive.
title: Nobody's Getting Special Treatment in 2022

sentence: Mandela Barnes, state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry and Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson.
author: Patrick Marley
title: Ron Johnson unifies Republicans at state convention as they remain split over issues and other candidates
